issue.title: Please release packages for different ROS versions

content.raw:
May I suggest that we could have multiple drcsim versions? 

drcsim-fuerte
drcsim-groovy
drcsim-hydro 

Which then has the appropriate dependencies. It would be nice to have this so that your users could then choose which version of ROS which they could use.
content.html:
May I suggest that we could have multiple drcsim versions?

drcsim-fuerte drcsim-groovy drcsim-hydro

Which then has the appropriate dependencies. It would be nice to have this so that your users could then choose which version of ROS which they could use.
